86382033.text: The Dire Wolf may do up to 2 combat moves.
86382033.name: SunovaPeach

90958523.text: The Charging Buck may do up to 2 combat leaps, each of distance exactly 2.
90958523.name: BordGameFreak

hand.upgraded: Place 1 common piece of your color on any empty square, or upgrade 1 of your common pieces.
hand.pieces: You may do 1 combat leap with one of your common pieces.

hand.name: Storm Elemental
hand.text: You may place 1 piece of your color on an empty square up to distance 3. With it, do up to 1 (if legendary), 3 (if heroic), or 5 (if common) combat moves in one direction. Then destroy it.

hand.name: Leviathan
hand.text: Chose one: Either downgrade a connected group of up to 3 upgraded pieces or destroy a connected group of up to 4 common pieces. (A group may have multiple colors.)

hand.name: Fire Elemental
hand.text: Destroy either all non-legendary enemy pieces on all adjacent squares or all common enemy pieces up to distance 2.

hand.name: Tree Shepherd
hand.text: Choose 1 of your pieces: If it is common, upgrade it; if heroic, it may do 1 combat move; if legendary, it may do 1 standard move.

hand.name: Kiskin Boughrunner
hand.text: The Kiskin Boughrunner may do up to 3 combat moves. Each move must end on a square adjacent to one of your pieces.

hand.name: Naiad
hand.text: You may choose up to 2 of your pieces adjacent to the Naiad and do 1 standard move with each.

discard.name: Charging Buck
discard.text: The Charging Buck may do up to 2 combat leaps, each of distance exactly 2.

discard.name: Woodland Druid
discard.text: Upgrade 1 common piece of each color.

discard.name: Forest Ancient
discard.text: Place 2 enemy common pieces on empty squares up to distance 2. Then destroy 2 common pieces of the same color or colors up to distance 3.

discard.name: Kiskin Spirit
discard.text: You may choose a card from your discard pile and put it on top of your deck. If you do, or if your discard pile was empty, draw 1 extra card from your deck at the end of this turn.

discard.name: Sapling
discard.text: Upgrade the Sapling after summoning it.

discard.name: Centaur Chieftain
discard.text: The Centaur Chieftain may do 1 combat move. If he does, you may do up to 3 combat moves in the same direction, using other pieces of yours.

discard.name: Sylvan Queen
discard.text: You may convert 1 non-legendary enemy piece on a diagonally adjacent square to your piece of the same rank.

discard.name: Forest Mystic
discard.text: At the end of this turn, draw 1 extra card from your deck and 1 extra card from the legendary deck.

discard.name: Unicorn
discard.text: Choose one: Either the Unicorn may do 1 combat move, or you gain 1 action.

discard.name: Centaur Spearman
discard.text: The Centaur Spearman may do 1 combat move. If he does, destroy the next piece in the same direction, unless it is legendary.

discard.name: Forest Wardens
discard.text: Destroy 1 common piece of an opponent with more common pieces than you. Destroy 1 heroic piece of an opponent with more upgraded pieces than you.

discard.name: Sylvan Princess
discard.text: You may convert 1 common enemy piece on a diagonally adjacent square to your common piece.

154.name: Green Conquest
154.text: You have at least 3 pieces on green squares, and at least 2 of them are upgraded.

159.name: Side Chain
159.text: Squares on two opposite sides of the board are connected by a chain of your pieces.

169.name: Isolation
169.text: An enemy piece is within 2 squares of another enemy piece, but it cannot get adjacent to any enemy piece in 3 or fewer moves through empty squares.

161.name: Imprisonment
161.text: You have at least 6 pieces adjacent to the same enemy piece.

168.name: Heroic Destruction
168.text: You destroyed at least 3 enemy pieces this turn, at least 1 of them upgraded.

151.name: Devastation
151.text: You destroyed at least 4 enemy pieces this turn.

160.name: Envelopment
160.text: You have at least 7 pieces adjacent to the same enemy piece.

171.name: Center Cross
171.text: You have at least 5 pieces on the central squares in a + or x pattern.

faction_cards.name: Forest Ancient
faction_cards.text: Place 2 enemy common pieces on empty squares up to distance 2. Then destroy 2 common pieces of the same color or colors up to distance 3.

faction_cards.name: Sylvan Princess
faction_cards.text: You may convert 1 common enemy piece on a diagonally adjacent square to your common piece.

faction_cards.name: Tree Shepherd
faction_cards.text: Choose 1 of your pieces: If it is common, upgrade it; if heroic, it may do 1 combat move; if legendary, it may do 1 standard move.
